Package it.polimi.ingsw.ps51.controller.gods

Class NormalGodsController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.ps51.utility.Observable<EventForClient>
it.polimi.ingsw.ps51.utility.GodControllerObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.ps51.controller.gods.NormalGodsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GodController
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArtemisController, DemeterController, HestiaController, PoseidonController, PrometheusController, TritonController
public class NormalGodsController
extends GodControllerObservable
implements GodController
This calls is a generic game turn controller, it implement the mechanics to manage a normal game turn, firstly the actual player decide which of its worker he want to use, then moves it and finally build a block

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    NormalGodsController​(Card card, Map map, Player player)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void build​(Coordinates buildOn, Level level)
    The method perform the build action and if the worker is in a winning condition game will be advised of this, otherwise Game will be informed that the turn is ended
    protected boolean isWinner()
    Verify if any of the workers of the actual player is in a winning condition
    void manageBuildChoice​(Coordinates buildOn, Level level)
    The method is called as a consequence of receiving a Build event that specifies where and at which level must be built a new tower's level.
    void manageMoveChoice​(Coordinates moveTo)
    The method is called as a consequence of receiving a MoveChoice event that specifies where to move the selected worker
    void manageWorkerChoice​(Worker worker)
    The method is called as a consequence of receiving a WorkerChoice event that specifies which of the player's workers must be selected to perform the turn
    void performMove​(Coordinates moveTo)
    This method move the worker to the selected position and then, if the actual player isn't in a winning condition, retrieve the list of the possible build actions that can be done and send them to the player through a ChooseBuild event; otherwise if the player is in a winning condition the Game is advised of this
    void searchForBuild()
    The method implements the search of the square where a new level can be built and send the information to the player
    void searchForMoves()
    The method retrieves the list of the valid positions in which the worker can be moved and send it to the actual player through a ChooseMove event
    void start()
    This method is that one which must be called to start the turn, it retrieves the list of the workers that can be moved and creates a ChooseWorker event which is sent to the actual player who choose the worker to use, if none of the workers of the actual player can be moved Game will be advised that the actual player lost the match

    Methods inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.ps51.utility.GodControllerObservable

    addGame, notifyToGame, removeGame

    Methods inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.ps51.utility.Observable

    addObserver, copyObservers, notify, removeObserver

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • NormalGodsController

      public NormalGodsController​(Card card, Map map, Player player)

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      This method is that one which must be called to start the turn, it retrieves the list of the workers that can be moved and creates a ChooseWorker event which is sent to the actual player who choose the worker to use, if none of the workers of the actual player can be moved Game will be advised that the actual player lost the match
      Specified by:
      start in interface GodController

    • searchForMoves

      public void searchForMoves()
      The method retrieves the list of the valid positions in which the worker can be moved and send it to the actual player through a ChooseMove event

    • performMove

      public void performMove​(Coordinates moveTo)
      This method move the worker to the selected position and then, if the actual player isn't in a winning condition, retrieve the list of the possible build actions that can be done and send them to the player through a ChooseBuild event; otherwise if the player is in a winning condition the Game is advised of this
      Parameters:
      moveTo - the coordinates where the worker must be moved

    • searchForBuild

      public void searchForBuild()
      The method implements the search of the square where a new level can be built and send the information to the player
      See Also:
      performMove(Coordinates)

    • build

      public void build​(Coordinates buildOn, Level level)
      The method perform the build action and if the worker is in a winning condition game will be advised of this, otherwise Game will be informed that the turn is ended
      Parameters:
      buildOn - the coordinates where the new level must be built
      level - the level that must be built

    • isWinner

      protected boolean isWinner()
      Verify if any of the workers of the actual player is in a winning condition
      Returns:
      true if at least one of the worker is in a winning condition, otherwise false is returned

    • manageWorkerChoice

      public void manageWorkerChoice​(Worker worker)
      The method is called as a consequence of receiving a WorkerChoice event that specifies which of the player's workers must be selected to perform the turn
      Specified by:
      manageWorkerChoice in interface GodController
      Parameters:
      worker - the selected worker

    • manageMoveChoice

      public void manageMoveChoice​(Coordinates moveTo)
      The method is called as a consequence of receiving a MoveChoice event that specifies where to move the selected worker
      Specified by:
      manageMoveChoice in interface GodController
      Parameters:
      moveTo - the coordinates where the worker must be moved

    • manageBuildChoice

      public void manageBuildChoice​(Coordinates buildOn, Level level)
      The method is called as a consequence of receiving a Build event that specifies where and at which level must be built a new tower's level.
      Specified by:
      manageBuildChoice in interface GodController
      Parameters:
      buildOn - the coordinates where the new level must be built
      level - the level that must be built
